## AnglrExceptionHandlerOptions.(constructor)

Creates instance of AnglrExceptionHandlerOptions

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(debugMode?: boolean, showAlsoAlert?: boolean);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  debugMode | boolean | Indication whether should logger log errors also in browser console |
|  showAlsoAlert | boolean | Indication that also alert should show error message |
